name: RapidBackend.NET
short_description: RapidBackend.NET provides an object based Data Access framework for .NET Applications. It will free developers and architects from worrying about the Data Access Layer. It also integrates method of accessing data from various sources (RDBMS, XML etc).

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
